posts.post_content:
How to win with a [Dandân](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dandân):  
-Cast [Dandân](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dandân)  
-Attack with everyone  
-Cast [Mirrorweave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mirrorweave) targeting [Dandân](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dandân)  
-All your opponent's creatures die, while you are attacking with an army of 4/1's  
-Win
posts.html:

-Win

posts.post_content:
Sneak [Sakashima's Student](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sakashima's Student) onto the field with ninjutsu and let him copy Dandân.  
That gives you a 4-power *Ninja Fish* attacking your opponent no matter if they have any islands or not!  
That's right, a Ninja Fish is just *that* awesome.
